dict.string: Select files with the same extension as the selected one

--set selectedItem to (POSIX path of (the selection as alias)) set theSelection to (selection of application "Finder") as alias --set theSelectionFolder to POSIX path of theSelection --set theSelectionFolder to folder of (selection of application "Finder") --as alias --tell application "Finder" to open folder (":Users:WannaGetHigh:Documents" as alias) display dialog folder of theSelection (*if (theSel's length) is equal to 1 then tell application "Finder" to set fPaths to files of ":Users:WannaGetHigh:Documents" set fileName to name of (info for theSel as alias) display dialog fileName repeat with thisFilePath in fPaths if name extension of thisFilePath is in validExtensions then display dialog thisFilePath as string end if end repeat else return "Select only one file" end if *) (*set pathList to {} repeat with anItem in theSel set the end of pathList to name of (info for anItem as alias) end repeat set {TID, text item delimiters} to {text item delimiters, return} set the clipboard to pathList as text set text item delimiters to TID set s to "Today is my birthday" set AppleScript's text item delimiters to "my" text item 1 of s*)
